sentence: While Georgia Governor Brian Kemp looks to use the state's economic metrics as a campaign advantage, poll numbers for Trump-endorsed former Sen. David Perdue and Democrat Stacey Abrams just trail the incumbent.
author: Kristen Altus
title: Georgia Republicans, Democrats lining up to challenge Gov. Kemp and his strong' state economy
